item.description:
AGENDA:

In May & June, we found out how Esther connected with "Abraham", learnt how to assess/ identify whether we're going "upstream" or "downstream" with our thoughts & feelings and suggestions to go "downstream" to attract more of what we want.

Most of the attendees voted to continue discussing Abraham's LOA teachings.

So, in July, we'll wrap up with watching & listening to more excerpts of the "Q & A workshop" where attendees asked questions and "Abraham" provided insights. We look forward to discuss further our impressions & experiences using LOA as taught by Abraham.

Background:
When you learn more about the Law Of Attraction, you can't help but become immersed in the "teachings of Abraham" about LOA. Esther Hicks, a best-selling author and an inspirational speaker, says she dialogs with or "channels" a group of spiritual teachers collectively known as "Abraham."

The Hicks have been conducting public Abraham-Hicks "Law of Attraction" workshops in the US & globally. They'll be here in Boston on 06/28/2008 ( http://www.abraham-hi... )


IMPORTANT: We'll start the "Abraham Hicks" discussion at 7:20 pm because there's so much "rich" materials to share & discuss.

Note: The $5.00 meeting fee will also include appetizers & drinks
You no longer have to bring food. You're welcome to bring wine.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Law of Attraction July Meeting
